mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.CH_ROOM_NM, A.CH_ROOM_NAME, A.CH_PERSONNEL, B.EMP_ID, C.EMP_NAME, D.CH_CON, D.CH_DATE, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY A.CH_ROOM_NM ORDER BY D.CH_DATE DESC) AS RANK FROM CHAT_ROOM A, CHAT_EMP B, EMPLOYEES C, CHAT_CONTENT D WHERE B.CH_ROOM_NM = A.CH_ROOM_NM AND D.CH_ROOM_NM = A.CH_ROOM_NM AND C.EMP_ID = B.EMP_ID AND A.CH_ROOM_NM IN (SELECT CH_ROOM_NM FROM CHAT_EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}) ) WHERE RANK = 1 ORDER BY CH_DATE DESC
SELECT A.*, B.EMP_PROFILE, B.EMP_NAME FROM CHAT_CONTENT A, EMPLOYEES B WHERE CH_ROOM_NM = #{chRoomNm} AND B.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID ORDER BY CH_DATE
SELECT A.*, B.EMP_PROFILE, B.EMP_NAME FROM CHAT_CONTENT A, EMPLOYEES B WHERE CH_CONTENT_NM = #{chContentNm} AND B.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID
